576920.name: Ladykiller in a Bind — Original Soundtrack
576920.description:
For maximum listening enjoyment, the Ladykiller in a Bind OST rearranges the game's over 50 dynamic music tracks into full-length, newly mixed/mastered/arranged compositions.

1. Allure 05:18
2. Chillin 02:42
3. Messin 02:56
4. Playin 02:29
5. Pomp 04:33
6. Shenanigans 03:44
7. Tango 05:13
8. Naif 03:02
9. Recital 02:16
10. Lazy 05:31
11. Wiles 02:09
12. Tiptoe 01:51
13. Devious 02:17
14. Wicked 03:41
15. Wander 03:11
16. Echoes 04:57
17. Hot Take (bonus track) 03:29
